quest: There is a dragon on the official flag of Wales
quest_zh: 威爾士的官方國旗上有一條龍

quest: Which TWO are associated with the 'Dunkirk Spirit'?
quest_zh: 哪兩個與“ Dunkirk Spirit”有關？

answers.answer: Small boats coming to the rescue

quest: Robert Browning, William Blake and Lord Byron were all famous poets
quest_zh: 羅伯特·布朗寧，威廉·布萊克和拜倫勳爵都是著名詩人

quest: A treaty gave independence to the south of Ireland in 1921
quest_zh: 條約於1921年賦予愛爾蘭南部獨立

quest: Which event is celebrated on the 5th of November each year?
quest_zh: 每年11月5日慶祝哪個活動？

answers.answer: The end of the Second World War
answers.answer_zh: 第二次世界大戰的結束

answers.answer: A plot to blow up the Houses of Parliament in 1605
The defeat of the Spanish Armada
The end of the First World War
answers.answer_zh: 第一次世界大戰的結束

quest: Who, in 1810 opened the first curry house in Britain called 'The Hindoostane Coffee House' in George Street, London?
quest_zh: 誰在1810年在倫敦的喬治街開設了英國的第一個名為“ Hindoostane Coffee House”的咖哩屋？

quest: Which sport often refers to the phrase 'rain stopped play'?
quest_zh: 哪種運動通常是指“雨水停止玩耍”一詞？

quest: St Augustine led missionaries from Rome. Where did he spread Christianity?
quest_zh: 聖奧古斯丁帶領傳教士來自羅馬。他在哪里傳播了基督教？

quest: Which TWO are used in making an Ulster fry?
quest_zh: 用哪兩個用於製作烏爾斯特炸？

quest: Robert Stephenson and George were famous pioneers of which industry?
quest_zh: 羅伯特·斯蒂芬森（Robert Stephenson）和喬治（George）是哪個行業的著名開拓者？

quest: EastEnders and Coronation Street are popular soap operas.
quest_zh: Eastenders和加冕街是受歡迎的肥皂劇。

quest: Which TWO major welfare changes were introduced between 1945 and 1950?
quest_zh: 1945年至1950年之間引入了哪兩種重大福利變化？

answers.answer: A social security system for everyone
answers.answer_zh: 每個人的社會保障系統

quest: Which Battle is commemorated in the Bayeux Tapestry?
quest_zh: Bayeux掛毯紀念哪個戰鬥？

quest: Which TWO of these were introduced before the First World War in 1914?
quest_zh: 其中兩個是在1914年第一次世界大戰之前引入的？

quest: There is no upper age limit for doing jury service
quest_zh: 陪審團沒有年齡上限

quest: Which TWO of these are associated with Sir Francis Drake?
quest_zh: 其中兩個與弗朗西斯·德雷克爵士有關？

quest: Mince pies are traditionally eaten on which day?
quest_zh: 傳統上哪一天吃了碎餡餅？

quest: What kind of battle was the Battle of Britain (1940)?
quest_zh: 《英國之戰》（1940年）是什麼樣的戰鬥？

quest: John Constable (1776-1837) founded the modern Police force in England
quest_zh: 約翰·康斯特布爾（John Constable）（1776-1837）在英格蘭建立了現代警察部隊

quest: Which TWO developments are associated with the 'Swinging Sixties'?
quest_zh: 哪兩個發展與“搖擺六十年代”有關？

quest: Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland each have devolved administrations which give them full control over all policies and laws
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭，威爾士和北愛爾蘭各自權利的政府，使他們完全控制所有政策和法律

quest: There are some MPs (Members of Parliament) who do not represent any of the main political parties
quest_zh: 有一些國會議員（議會議員）不代表任何主要政黨

quest: The National Citizen Service provides military training to young people
quest_zh: 國家公民服務部為年輕人提供軍事培訓

quest: Who can only give 'advice, warn and encourage' about government matters?
quest_zh: 誰只能就政府事務提供“建議，警告和鼓勵”？
